name: relaxedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel happy and comfortable because nothing is worrying you: They were lounging relaxedly on the sofas when I came into the room. "No problem," she said, relaxedly dangling her legs into the swimming pool.
More examplesFewer examplesDespite his admiration for the singer, he found that he could chat with her quite relaxedly.She comes across as very laid-back and relaxedly self-confident.A large group of teenagers was relaxedly and good-humouredly waiting in the square.
